A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been a Star Wars fan for over 25 years\, I grew up watching these movies and I don't understand all of the hate this film is getting. Rian Johnson did an amazing job. I can acknowledge it has its flaws and isn't perfect\, but what movie is? None of the originals were\, and certainly not the prequels. It was a very well directed film with great acting that took the story in a very compelling and unexpected direction. I love the character arcs\, especially Luke\, Rey and Kylo. And the soundtrack\, John Williams.... 'nuff said. After a second viewing the thing I'm most disappointed about is that I have to wait two years to see how it all ends.
